Text:
TY for these.  I'm a daily downloader.  I seed them for at least a week.  

I prefer the streams that have his parody commercials.  Not sure which station that was but sometimes in the past I've listened to a show from time to time that was full of parody commercials.

...it was this station and there will be more....when the colorado rockies play baseball it is broadcast on this station...and rush gets pre-empted from the broadcast but is still on their online streaming...when that happens they put in the parodies where the commercials and news would normally be.................the late nite station in columbus ohio, wtvn,  has the parodies every night!!
